name: Roly-Poly (Melt_Azat)
description: Roly-Poly is a game full of fun. Well-developed physics makes the traps even more impenetrable. Each level has unique obstacles, you need to find the perfect moment to get to the finish line. Only 1% of people will be able to complete the game without falling into a trap. Can you pass hundreds of obstacles in dozens of levels? Try to pass my game, test your strength!
